2666.name: Infront of the Open Hanger Doors
description: Before you stands a massive hangar.  Behind the doors the Vectorian
Ballista was built.  The weapon was used against the Tripower but
failed.  The hangar itself looks to be decaying.

2633.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2660.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MH{manger {c[{RB{c] {MN{morth{x
description: You stand outside the second hangar here on the Magitek Base.  The
road goes northwards past Vector and into something else.  You see
troops marching back and forth on this road, preparing for something.

2644.name: A path behind the equipment shop
description: You step out behind a secret door from the shop to the north.  A
small worn path leads through the snow, fresh foot prints march to the
south.

2641.name: The Pillars Of Darkness
description: {*You are walking between the dark pillars.  This is the only pathway
in this temple, which leads to the north and south.  Behind one
pillar, a dark figure hisses at your presences, and ducks behind the
pillar.  Red eyes seem to peek out from behind the pillars, looking at
you, staring.  {x

2632.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2623.name: Bedroom
description: You find yourself in a huge suite adorned with azure blue tapestries.
Golden sconces holding torches are spaced along the redwood panelled walls,
each bearing a tiny globe of light.  A four poster bed draped with
shimmering white tapestries, Woven in gold dipicts dragons in flight.

2617.name: The Backyard Garden
description: You are standing on a sunlit garden behind the castle.  Many varities of
flowers grow all about, very pleasurable to eyes.  To the west, there is a
splendid view over the field down over the lake.  A double door leads into
the castle proper to the south.  It is warm and calm here.

2640.name: The Temple Of Darkness
description: {*Your in the Temple Of Darkness.  You cannot see around you, only a
row of pillars leading south, with tourches on them.  The rest of the
temple is shrouded in darkness.  You almost see figures moving around,
behind the pillars.  {x

2620.name: Bedroom
description: You find yourself in a huge suite adorned with azure blue tapestries.
Golden sconces holding torches are spaced along the redwood panelled walls,
each bearing a tiny globe of light.  A four poster bed draped with
shimmering white tapestries, Woven in gold dipicts dragons in flight.

2636.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2653.name: Engine Room
description: You stand in the Engine Room.  The sounds of the motor running off
of the fire of coal echos in this dark, dirty hole.  Some magitek
warriors walk around.

2629.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: You stand in a tunnel under the barn and castle.  Above you a trap door
leads into a dungeon.  To the west is a shaft going somewhere.

2631.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2685.name: The Road To Vector
description: As you walk towards the border, you see Legionaires standing guard,
watching you.  To the north, you see the road is blocked by a
checkpoint, which is surrounded by barbed wire and fencing.
Vectorians stand on guard, keeping an eye on you...  Keeping an eye on
the legionaires here, waiting.

2645.name: The Road South
description: The snow swirls around you, on this small road leading south.  The
sound of iron hitting iron echos from the south.  Also, a large, dark
shadow appears through the snow, but cannot be seen from the snow
fling around your face.

2643.name: The Throne Of Darkness
description: {*A large throne, made from the dark rocks that make up this temple,
stands in glory, on a platform, above the rest.  A dark, cloaked
figure sits on it, his eyes glowing a dark green.  You stand in a
pentagram here, black candles surround it, glowing a green glow also.
To the west, a large model of what looks like a Makou Reactor stands,
surrounded by fake snow.  To the east, a long, sharp sword hangs from
a near by pillar.  A large, black flag hangs behind the throne, almost
looks like it is floating in mid-air.  {x

2610.name: The Ball Room (South)
description: The glow of torches, affixed in golden sconces along the walls, plays
over finely woven tapestries.  The marble dancefloor continues seamlessly to
each of the three chair lined walls.

2614.name: The Attic
description: You are in an attic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.
Dust layers everything including itself, clutter lines the walls, several
centuries of forgotten heirloms are stored here in boxes, trunks and chests.

2677.name: Deck 1 [Warrior Bunker]
description: You step into the first desk.  You see it is a large room, three
doors, one on each wall leads into diffrent rooms of the desk.  The
walls are made from metal and the little round windows look out.

2693.name: Locker Room
description: You enter the room, only to be meet by the enemy.  Get ready to
rumble...

2686.name: The Road To Vector
description: You walk on the dry road, the dust kicks around you heels.  The sea
of Istar can be seen here, the dark blue waters ripple along the
shore.  The Great Vectorian City of St.  Plattsburg hovers in the far
distance, you see Vectorian Destroyers on patrol.  You Approach the
checkpoint.

2694.name: The Magitek Stronghold
description: You step into the first desk.  You see it is a large room, three
doors, one on each wall leads into diffrent rooms of the desk.  The
walls are made from metal and the little round windows look out.

2619.name: Bedroom
description: You find yourself in a huge suite adorned with azure blue tapestries.
Golden sconces holding torches are spaced along the redwood panelled walls,
each bearing a tiny globe of light.  A four poster bed draped with
shimmering white tapestries, Woven in gold dipicts dragons in flight.

2608.name: The Ball Room (Center)
description: A crystal chandelier hangs suspended in the center of the room, lighting
the whole room with white sparkling light.  The floor is perfectly polished
seamless white marble, stretching to the far wall, and north and south as
far as the eye can see.  Chairs line the eastern wall, and a large banquet
table is just off the western wall providing snacks and drink for the
hungary dancers.

2624.name: Bedroom
description: You find yourself in a huge suite adorned with azure blue tapestries.
Golden sconces holding torches are spaced along the redwood panelled walls,
each bearing a tiny globe of light.  A four poster bed draped with
shimmering white tapestries, Woven in gold dipicts dragons in flight.

2600.name: The Gates Of A Castle
description: The only thing stopping you from entering the castle now is a large,
closed gate directly in front of you.  You can hear shouting from deep
inside the castle, though the content of the words is unintelligible.

2683.name: The Road To Vector
description: The grass and audible seem very disturbed here.  Smoke rises out of
the fields around you, and the dust on the road seems very trampled.
Barbed wire and barriers line the road. Sounds of sword fights echo
around, and the screams of men in a heated battle.

2654.name: Vectorian Destroyer [854Cr1]
description: You jump off the TriPower Destroyer and onto the railing of the
Vectorian Destoryer.  You see Sailors and Magitek Warriors greeting
you with there weapons.  The captain from the helm screams 'ATTACK'!

2642.name: The Pillars Of Darkness
description: {*To the south you see a ring of light, where the pillars disappear,
and a large opening is.  Figures run behind the pillars, staring at
you with there red eyes, glaring, looking into the depth of your soul.
Somewhere, a cold gust of wind blows.....  {x

2607.name: The Center Hallway
description: Gleaming grey streaked white marble frames a long hallway running
north-south here.  The glow of torches, affixed in golden sconces along the
walls, plays over finely woven tapestries.  Archways open east and west, and
the hallway continues north.

2680.name: Outskirts of Lucullus
description: On the outskirts of the town of "{CLucullus{x", the sounds of life
throw a mirror compared to the empty feelings of the endless road.
The north holds activity, not pesantry activity like the town, but a
more sinister one.  The borderline of Vector lies northwest.

2664.name: Inside The Smaller Hanger
description: A medium size hangar stands before you, its insides empty.  The
first Vectorian Airship was built here, lost to the War against the
Tripower.  This building also looks to be decaying.

2695.name: RotoMagitek Armor [PT-1]
description: You enter the room, only to be meet by the enemy.  Get ready to
rumble...

2638.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.  A
ladder goes upwards.

2621.name: Bedroom
description: You find yourself in a huge suite adorned with azure blue tapestries.
Golden sconces holding torches are spaced along the redwood panelled walls,
each bearing a tiny globe of light.  A four poster bed draped with
shimmering white tapestries, Woven in gold dipicts dragons in flight.

2688.name: The Road To Vector
description: The northward bound holds the intersection, deciding the
destination from Vector or St.  Plattsburg.  During the night, the
lights of Vector throw beams into the night skies and during the day
the smell of Industrial Waste is in the air.

2684.name: The Road To Vector
description: The final point before the Checkpoint to Vector holds an ominous
ambience. Armed border patrols watch you with careful eyes. Some
of them have there hands on their sword, waiting for you to make
the right more... This is the end of the TriPower's Lands, and
the begining of Vector... The place where most of the war has
been taking place.

2626.name: A Tunnel Going Downwards
description: You are climbing on a ladder under the barn outside the Castle.
Downwards leads to darkness, upwards leads to the barn.

2681.name: The Road To Vector
description: The grass and audible seem very disturbed here.  Smoke rises out of
the fields around you, and the dust on the road seems very trampled.
Barbed wire and barriers line the road, to the south you see a small
camp built.  The flags of the TriPower fly high in the air, this is a
war zone.

2656.name: Vectorian Battle Cruicer [231lsd]
description: You jump from the TriPower Destroyer and onto the Vectorian
Destroyer.  You see the Magitek Army is ready for your fight, and they
await on deck, there swords drawn.  You see this ship is bigger than
the rest, alot larger.

2627.name: The Bottom Of The Shaft
description: You stand at the bottom of a great shaft.  Above you is the barn near the
castle.  To the north, a small wooden door leads north into a room, more or
less.  The shaft here is very rough cut, the walls are dark stone, roughly
cut, and water is falling down the sides of it.

2659.name: The Helm (Deck 2)
description: You stand on the above deck, which is like a sitting room for
someone.  A chair and a couch looks out over the sea.  All around you
the room is filled with wood, and big large windows looking out.

2663.name: The Northern Road From MagiTek
description: Inside the compound, you see there are only a few buildings, some
small buildings that look like they hold offices or guard booths.  To
the east, a large hangar stands..  The road continues north, to a very
very very large hangar.

2637.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2603.name: The Library
description: You are in a great library.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire
area.  Upon great mohagany shelves lined with gold are hundreds of books,
tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and color.  Magic globes of
light keep the room well lit.  It is very quiet here.

2696.name: Magitek Armor [T-25a]
description: You enter the room, only to be meet by the enemy.  Get ready to
rumble...

2674.name: Forward Deck
description: You stand on the forward deck of the destroyer.  You see the whole
sea here, the view makes you smile.  All around you the sounds of
battling echos across the sea, as men fight men, and the two ships
attack each other.

2650.name: The Bow
description: You stand on the forward deck of the destroyer.  You see the whole
sea here, the view makes you smile.  All around you the sounds of
battling echos across the sea, as men fight men, and the two ships
attack each other

2648.name: The Vectorian Destroyer [11A]
description: You jump off the TriPower Destroyer and onto the railing of the
Vectorian Destoryer.  You see Sailors and Magitek Warriors greeting
you with there weapons.  The captain from the helm screams 'ATTACK'!

2665.name: The Northern Road From MagiTek
description: You walk inbetween the Compound and the very large hangor to the
north.  You do not see any troops around, but the sound of
construction echos from this huge hanger, that is about the size of
Vector.

2616.name: The Attic
description: You are in an attic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.
Dust layers everything including itself, clutter lines the walls, several
centuries of forgotten heirloms are stored here in boxes, trunks and chests.

2678.name: Deck 3
description: You being to climb into the bowels of the ship.  The ladder goes
down even farther.  To the south are the rooms of this deck.  You can
go either up or down.

2606.name: The Center Hallway
description: Gleaming grey streaked white marble frames a long hallway running
north-south here.  The glow of torches, affixed in golden sconces along the
walls, plays over finely woven tapestries.  An archway opens east and glass
double door opens north into the garden.

2625.name: A Tunnel Going Downwards
description: You are climbing on a ladder under the barn outside the Castle.
Downwards leads to darkness, upwards leads to the barn.

2691.name: The Vectorian Camp
description: You enter a small camp, which has several tents.  Troops walk
around, some looking like they are ready for combat, some who are off
duty and enjoying the day.  The look at you, and shrug it off.  You
see a cook in the distance cooking some local food.  Another place,
you see a high commander giving orders and staring at a map.

2649.name: Mid Deck of the Destroyer
description: You being to climb into the bowels of the ship.  The ladder goes
down even farther.  To the south are the rooms of this deck.  You can
go either up or down.

2655.name: Vectorian Destroyer [420p0tnow]
description: You jump off the TriPower Destroyer and onto the railing of the
Vectorian Destoryer.  You see Sailors and Magitek Warriors greeting
you with there weapons.  The captain from the helm screams 'ATTACK'!

2618.name: The Barn
description: A large barn, bales of wheat, corn and hay are piled against the wall,
and some vegetables are in carts.  Stables stretch across the eastern wall,
all with fine horses and leather saddles stored there ready for use.  The
exit back to the garden is to the west.

2647.name: The Door To The Makou Reactor
description: +--------------------+ These are the letters you see on this Makou
|  #####       ##### | Reactor, EoS...Empire Of Sephiroth. The Makou
| ##      ###  ##    | reactor towers above you, but no sounds of it
| ####   ## ## ##### | working comes from it, only the sounds of the
| ##     ## ##    ## | citizens banging on it, working on it, build-
|  #####  ###  ##### | -ing it. The snow all around the area curls
+--------------------+ around the base of this reactor....

2675.name: Deck 1
description: You being to climb into the bowels of the ship.  The ladder goes
down even farther.  To the south are the rooms of this deck.  You can
go either up or down.

2661.name: The Northern Road From MagiTek
description: The Road continues, a small compound of buildings can be seen to
the north.  The Magitek Base is south, a compound to the north.

2697.name: Magitek Armor [PT-325]
description: You enter the room, only to be meet by the enemy.  Get ready to
rumble...

2657.name: Mid Deck
description: You step onto the deck of the destroyer.  All around you magitek
soldiers begin to bare down on you, there swords drawn, and there
teeth showing.  To the north you see the helm and the main part of the
ship.  To the south, the forward decks of the ship.

2611.name: The Upper Chambers
description: A railed walkway goes all around the lower chamber here and a spiral
staircase leads down, a crystal chandelier hangs suspended in the center of
the room, its bright light gleaming off polished ivory and gold trim below
and the polished wood here.  Pictures of the ancestors of this castle are
hung along the walls, a large stain glass window looks out over the gates.

2662.name: The Northern Road From MagiTek
description: The Road continues, a small compound of buildings can be seen to
the north.  The Magitek Base is south, a compound to the north.

2646.name: Before The Makou Reactor
description: The awe of it, standing very tall in the air (about 100 feet) a
large iron tower stands....  You reconize it as a Makou Reactor.  You
see Mahn'Tor Citizens working on it, building it...  There is no sign
of the 4 Bars Of The TriPower, which is usually seen on all Makou
Reactors...  Painting in rought lettering on the side, is the owner of
the reactor..

2613.name: The Upper Hallway
description: Gleaming grey streaked white marble frames a long hallway running
north-south here.  The glow of torches, affixed in golden sconces along the
walls, plays over finely woven tapestries.  Doorways are east and west, and
a dropdown set of stairs are tied to the ceiling.

2692.name: Living Corridors
description: You enter the room, only to be meet by the enemy.  Get ready to
rumble...

2602.name: The Entrance Hall
description: A crystal chandelier hangs suspended in the center of the room, its
bright light gleaming off polished ivory and gold trim.  The huge white oak
entrance way opens into the north wall, framed by a polished golden oak
archway.  A grand spiral staircase leads up the next floor.  An archway
opens east, and a hallway leads into the castle to the north.

2690.name: The Vectorian Intersection
description: The road forks at your feet, demanding you to make a decision for
your destination.  Shall you journey to Vector, St.  Plattsburg.  Or
shall you go home.  There is a sign with distances planted in the
ground here.  To the west, a small camp has been built.  The
Vectorian/Magitek Flags fly high, giving warning to all who pass.
A "sign" stands in one corner of the road.
[NORTH]
Fortress Of Vector   |
MagiTek Factory      |

2609.name: The Ball Room (North)
description: The glow of torches, affixed in golden sconces along the walls, plays
over finely woven tapestries.  The marble dancefloor continues seamlessly to
each of the three chair lined walls.

2628.name: The Holding Cell
description: You stand in a holding cell.  Along the rouch cut walls you see wooden
benches, and shackles under the benches.  The room looks like it was just
used, not that long ago, some junk lies on the floor.  On the walls,
lanterns hang, unlite.  A large trap door stands in the middle of the
dungeon, leading off into unknown parts.

2622.name: Bedroom
description: You find yourself in a huge suite adorned with azure blue tapestries.
Golden sconces holding torches are spaced along the redwood panelled walls,
each bearing a tiny globe of light.  A four poster bed draped with
shimmering white tapestries, Woven in gold dipicts dragons in flight.

2687.name: The Vectorian/TriPower Checkpoint
description: You walk into the Vectorian/TriPower checkpoint.  Several
Vectorians sneer at you, and bark orders at others.  You see a wall of
criss-cross barbed wire, extending way into the fields.  Several
Vectorians stand guard before the small opening before the fence.  A
desk sits to one side, a vectorian sits at it, checking IDs and
passports.

2676.name: Deck 2
description: You being to climb into the bowels of the ship.  The ladder goes
down even farther.  To the south are the rooms of this deck.  You can
go either up or down.

2652.name: The Helm
description: You enter the helm room.  Here a captain steps back from the
controls of the ship, and draws his sword.  You see a ladder leading
up and down from here.  The room, as you look around quickly is filled
with maps and charts.  Several low rank saliors stand in here, doing
work, until they see you.

2689.name: The Road To Vector
description: Northward bound holds the intersection, deciding the destination from
Vector or St.  Plattsburg.  During the night, the lights of Vector throw
beams into the night skies, and during the day, the smell of industrial
wastes linger lightly.

2630.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2615.name: The Attic
description: You are in an attic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.
Dust layers everything including itself, clutter lines the walls, several
centuries of forgotten heirloms are stored here in boxes, trunks and chests.

2698.name: A Dark Hall
description: You step into a dark hallway.  You can see it goes south.  A door
is there, ready for you to go into it...

2679.name: Sleeping Corridors
description: You enter the room, only to be meet by the enemy.  Get ready to
rumble...

2604.name: The Dining Room
description: A crystal chandelier hangs suspended in the center of the room, a large
tableclothed table set imaculately with fine silver and china.
Candlelabrums grace the table in several places, all topped with small
globes of light.  Fifty place settings are ready for guests as they arrive.

2682.name: The 420th Division Of The Legion
description: You enter a small camp, which has several tents.  Troops walk
around, some looking like they are ready for combat, some who are off
duty and enjoying the day.  The look at you, and shrug it off.  You
see a cook in the distance cooking some local food.  Another place,
you see a high commander giving orders and staring at a map.

2601.name: Inside The Castle Walls
description: A large Castle was hidden behind the walls before, a well kept courtyard
is here, the walls behind you are tall and well defended, but the castle
before you is wonderous.  Light seems to emanate from the walls and
fortafications on top, giving the castle a holy glow.

2651.name: Rear
description: You stand to the rear of the ship.  Here a set of stairs goes
upwards, and into the helm.  Another set of stairs goes downwards,
into the engine room.  Back south is the main part of the ship.

2658.name: The Helm (Deck 1)
description: You enter the helm room.  Here a captain steps back from the
controls of the ship, and draws his sword.  You see a ladder leading
up and down from here.  The room, as you look around quickly is filled
with maps and charts.  Several low rank saliors stand in here, doing
work, until they see you.

2612.name: The Upper Hallway
description: Gleaming grey streaked white marble frames a long hallway running
north-south here.  The glow of torches, affixed in golden sconces along the
walls, plays over finely woven tapestries.  Doorways are east and west, and
the hallway continues north.

2635.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2605.name: The Kitchen
description: The kitchen is filled silverware, gold trimmed plates and pots filled
with food.  Here is where all the meals for those who live in the castle are
made.  A servant boy hurries past you on an errand to deliver a plate of
something to one of the Lord's guests.

2634.name: A Tunnel Underground
description: The shaft goes east to west.  Lanterns hang on either side, giving off
some light, leading to someplace.  Water falls down around you, leaking and
spilling on the floor.  The floor has about an inch of water on it.

2690.name: A Vectorian Sailor~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2690.room_name: A Vectorian Sailor comes straight for you.

2691.name: Magitek Soldier~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2691.room_name: A Magitek Soldier has drawn his sword, and begins his attack.

2692.name: The Vectorian Captain~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2692.room_name: The Captain has left his helm, and is coming for you.

2693.name: A Speck~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2693.room_name: A speck is here, charging with energy.

2694.name: Flan~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2694.room_name: A pile of slime, oozing towards you.

2695.name: NO.024~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2695.room_name: A magitek warrior stands here, his arms are missing, replaced with swords.

2696.name: A Trapper~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2696.room_name: A Trapper hangs down from the ceiling here.

2697.name: Neo-MagiTek Armor~
description:
You see before you Vectorian Soldier riding atop of a MagiTek
Armor.  The beast seems to not run like the other MagiTek Armor do. 
This one is loud, and has black smoke pouring out of it.  It emities a
machinery noise (exactly like a diseal engine), and clanks forward,
coming towards you.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2697.room_name: A large growling, smoking machine stands here, slashing it claws at you.

2699.name: Neo-Magitek Armor~
description:
You see before you Vectorian Soldier riding atop of a MagiTek
Armor.  The beast seems to not run like the other MagiTek Armor do. 
This one is loud, and has black smoke pouring out of it.  It emities a
machinery noise (exactly like a diseal engine), and clanks forward,
coming towards you.
subroutines: M grall 2699 100~
2699.room_name: A big, fire breathing, smoke pouring machine stands before you.

2640.name: {*A Shadow{x~
description: You only see the figure of something moving in the blackness.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

2641.name: {*The Shadow{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2641.room_name: {*A pair of {RRED{* eyes stares out behind the pillar{x

2642.name: {*Something{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 2642 75~
2642.room_name: {*Something behind the pillar stares at you....{x

2670.name: A Legionaire~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 2673 follow me~
M speech 2670 gogogo~
M entry 2675 100~
2670.room_name: A Legionaire stands here on patrol.

2662.name: (no short description)~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

2600.name: the Second Lord Of Vector's Guard~
description:
He looks somewhat big, but its only his armor.  He stands here infront of
the gates, holding a spear in his hand, and looking straight forward.  He
doesn't notice you are here.
2600.room_name: A large castle guard stands here, keeping watch.

2601.name: The {RC{rh{*a{ro{Rs{B Warrior{x~
description:
This beast stands twice as tall as you.  Foam drips from its mouth
down on to its spiked leather boots.  The glare bouncing off of his
polished skull helm is almost enough to blind you.  He chuckles as he
swings his mace, wich is easily as big as you, around at his side. 
Propped in front of him like a huge iron wall is a massive shield,
emblazoned with five flaming swords.  The stench of this creature
alone is enough to knock you out.
2601.d_flags: D Mwuhaahahah, YOU MAY HAVE GOTTEN ME BUT YOU'LL NEVER GET US ALL!!!!~
subroutines: F vul S
2601.room_name: A Warrior of Chaos stands before you with his mace in hand.

2602.name: Slaanesh~
description:
A tall figure in black garb stands before you, blocking your
passage.  Its head hooded, you can only make out small features of its
face, but it does not look human.  A menacing feeling overwhelms you
as you gaze up upon this unknown creature.  As you look downward, more
toward your eye level, you notice a mithrill dagger hanging out of the
long sleeves of its robe.
subroutines: F vul S
2602.room_name: A tall figure in dark robes lurks in the shadows.

2603.name: The {RC{rh{*a{ro{Rs {yH{*o{yu{*n{yd{x~
description:
This horribly ugly creature is foaming at the mouth and staring in
your direction.  Its fangs still fresh with blood, gleam brightly in
the light.  Small beaty red eyes, recesed into its skull, glare
hungrily at you.  The beast stands easily at 5 feet tall, on all four
legs.  Its fur matted closely to its body covered in dirt, blood and
flesh.
2603.room_name: A huge hound like creature foaming at the mouth is here.

2604.name: The {RC{rh{*a{ro{Rs {*K{wn{Wi{wg{*h{wt{x~
description:
Arms pulsing and forming, a dark ruddy beast stands in front of
you.  Humanoid in shape and with the same amount of appendages, it
walks with a smooth gait, a glowing aura surrounds it's ever-changing
form.  On the head-like appendage, you notice 2 bright spots of
burning orange, it turns them towards you, you guess they must be
eyes...
subroutines: F vul S
2604.room_name: A heavily armored Knight of Chaos is here.

2605.name: The {RC{rh{*a{ro{Rs {BW{wi{bz{wz{Ba{wr{bd{x~
description:
A tall figure in black garb stands before you, blocking your
passage.  Its head hooded, you can only make out small features of its
face, but it does not look human.  A menacing feeling overwhelms you
as you gaze up upon this unknown creature.  As you look downward, more
toward your eye level, you notice a mithrill dagger hanging out of the
long sleeves of its robe.
subroutines: F vul S
2605.room_name: A dark robed creature is here, eyeing you...

2606.name: (no short description)~
subroutines: F vul S
